By [93moptimizing[0m the [93mCu[0m/[93mAg[0m [93mmolar[0m [93mratio[0m to [93m1[0m:[93m1[0m ([93mAg[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m [93mCu[0m [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m -[93mCTC[0m-[93mTAPT[0m), the [93mcatalyst[0m [93machieves[0m a [93mFaradaic[0m [93mefficiency[0m for [93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mH[0m [93m4[0m ([93mFE[0m([93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mH[0m [93m4[0m )) of [93m51[0m.[93m5[0m% ± [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m% at a [93mreduction[0m [93mpotential[0m of -[93m1[0m.[93m774[0m [93mV[0m [93mversus[0m ([93mvs[0m.) [93mRHE[0m, [93malong[0m with a [93mcurrent[0m [93mdensity[0m of [93m439[0m.[93m0[0m ± [93m7[0m.[93m3[0m [93mmA[0m [93mcm[0m -[93m2[0m and [93mexcellent[0m [93mstability[0m ([93mFE[0m([93mC[0m [93m2[0m [93mH[0m [93m4[0m ) > [93m40[0m% over [93m10[0m [93mh[0m), [93moutperforming[0m [93mmost[0m [93msingle[0m-[93mmetal[0m [93mM[0m/[93mCOFs[0m and [93mMOF[0m-[93mbased[0m [93melectrocatalysts[0m that [93mpredominantly[0m [93myield[0m [93mC1[0m [93mproducts[0m. In [93msitu[0m [93mspectroscopic[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mmechanistic[0m [93mstudies[0m [93mindicate[0m that [93mAg[0m [93msites[0m [93mprimarily[0m [93mfacilitate[0m [93mCO[0m [93mgeneration[0m, while [93mneighboring[0m [93mCu[0m [93msites[0m [93mpromote[0m [93mC[0m─[93mC[0m [93mbond[0m [93mformation[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93mintroduces[0m a [93mnovel[0m [92mdesign[0m [93mstrategy[0m for [92mconstructing[0m [93mCOF[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mmaterials[0m with [93madjacent[0m [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m, [93mhighlighting[0m [93mtheir[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mpotential[0m for the [93melectrochemical[0m [93mconversion[0m of [93mCO[0m [93m2[0m into [93mvaluable[0m [93mC2[0m+ [93mchemicals[0m.
- From [93mHeat[0m to [93mElectrons[0m: [93mBridging[0m [93mHeterogeneous[0m [93mLiquid[0m-[93mPhase[0m [93mThermal[0m and [93mElectrocatalytic[0m [93mOxidation[0m of [93mEthylene[0m [93mGlycol[0m over [93mCo[0m([93m3[0m)[93mO[0m([93m4[0m).: The [93mselective[0m [93moxidation[0m of [93malcohols[0m under [93mthermal[0m and [93melectrocatalytic[0m [93mconditions[0m [93mpresents[0m a [93mpromising[0m [91mroute[0m to [93mvalue[0m-[93madded[0m [93mchemicals[0m [93musing[0m [93msustainable[0m [93menergy[0m [94msources[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mestablish[0m [93mmechanistic[0m [93mconvergence[0m between [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mliquid[0m-[93mphase[0m [93mthermal[0m [93moxidation[0m of [93methylene[0m [93mglycol[0m ([93mEG[0m) and its [93melectrocatalytic[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mreaction[0m ([93mEGOR[0m) [93musing[0m [93mmesostructured[0m [93mCo[0m [93m3[0m [93mO[0m [93m4[0m [93msynthesized[0m [93mvia[0m [93mhard[0m [93mtemplating[0m as a [93mcatalyst[0m. [93mComprehensive[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m [93massessments[0m and [93mab[0m [93minitio[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93mdynamics[0m [93msimulations[0m [93mreveal[0m [93manalogous[0m [93msurface[0m [93mintermediates[0m and [91mpathways[0m in [93mboth[0m [93mregimes[0m, [93mresulting[0m in the [93msame[0m [93mproduct[0m [93mdistribution[0m. [93mCo[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mcenters[0m and [93mOH[0m - [93mspecies[0m [93mfacilitate[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mvia[0m [93mproton[0m-[93mcoupled[0m [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m ([93mPCET[0m), with [93mmolecular[0m [93moxygen[0m or the [93mapplied[0m [93manodic[0m [93mpotential[0m [93mregenerating[0m [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93mselectivity[0m to [93mglycolate[0m, [93mformate[0m, and [93moxalate[0m is [33mgoverned[0m by [93mtemperature[0m, [93mEG[0m [93mconcentration[0m, [93mpH[0m, [93mapplied[0m [93mO[0m [93m2[0m [93mpressure[0m, or [93mpotential[0m. [93mSurface[0m and [93mbulk[0m [93mcharacterization[0m [93mconfirm[0m the [93mrobustness[0m of the [93mspinel[0m [93mstructure[0m, [93menabling[0m [93mmultiple[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mrecycling[0m. These [93minsights[0m [93mprovide[0m a [93mfirst[0m [93mmechanistic[0m [92mframework[0m [93mconnecting[0m [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mthermal[0m and [93melectrocatalytic[0m [93moxidation[0m over [93mnon[0m-[93mnoble[0m [93mmetal[0m [93moxide[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93mpaving[0m the [93mway[0m for [92mdesigning[0m [93mmulti[0m-[93mfunctional[0m [93mmaterials[0m for [93mchemical[0m [93msynthesis[0m under [93melectrothermal[0m [93mconditions[0m.
- [93mDevelopment[0m of [93mborated[0m [93mmesoporous[0m [93mzirconia[0m [93mnanocatalyst[0m for the [93mgreen[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mhydroquinone[0m [93mdiacetate[0m.: The [93mdemand[0m for [93mhighly[0m [93mactive[0m and [93mreusable[0m [93msolid[0m [93macid[0m [93mcatalysts[0m [93mhas[0m [93mled[0m to the [93mdevelopment[0m of [93mborated[0m [93mmesoporous[0m [93mzirconia[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m, which [93mexhibit[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m in the [93mgreen[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mpharmaceutical[0m [93mintermediates[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mfocuses[0m on the [93mpreparation[0m, [93mcharacterization[0m, and [93mcatalytic[0m [93mapplication[0m of [93mborated[0m [93mmesoporous[0m [93mzirconia[0m for the [93mefficient[0m [93mproduction[0m of [93m1[0m,[93m4[0m-[93mdiacetoxybenzene[0m, a [93mvaluable[0m [93mcompounds[0m in [93mdrug[0m [93msynthesis[0m. The [93mcatalyst[0m was [93msynthesized[0m [93musing[0m a [93msol[0m-[93mgel[0m [93mmethod[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by [93mboric[0m [93macid[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m to [93menhance[0m [93msurface[0m [93macidity[0m and [93msurface[0m [93marea[0m. [93mComprehensive[0m [93mcharacterization[0m through [93mXRD[0m, [93mFTIR[0m, [93mTEM[0m, [93mBET[0m, and [93mThermal[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mconfirmed[0m the [93msuccessful[0m [93mformation[0m of a [93mhighly[0m [93mporous[0m, [93mthermally[0m [93mstable[0m, and [93mwell[0m-[93mdispersed[0m [93mboron[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93mzirconia[0m [93mstructure[0m. The [93mcatalytic[0m [93mefficiency[0m was [93mevaluated[0m in the [93macetylation[0m of [93mhydroquinone[0m under [93moptimized[0m [93mconditions[0m, where a [93mmaximum[0m [93myield[0m of [93m95[0m.[93m7[0m% was [93machieved[0m at [93m80[0m °[93mC[0m within [93m90[0m [93mmin[0m [93musing[0m a [93mcatalyst[0m [93mloading[0m of [93m25[0m [93mwt[0m%. [93mCompared[0m to [93mtraditional[0m [93mhomogeneous[0m [93macid[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93mborated[0m [93mmesoporous[0m [93mzirconia[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mstability[0m and [93mrecyclability[0m, as [93mdemonstrated[0m by its [93mability[0m to [93mmaintain[0m [93m78[0m% of its [93minitial[0m [93mactivity[0m after [93mthree[0m [93mconsecutive[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mcycles[0m, with only a [93m18[0m% [93mdecline[0m in [93mefficiency[0m. The [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mnature[0m of the [93mcatalyst[0m [93mfacilitated[0m its [93measy[0m [93mrecovery[0m and [93mreuse[0m, [93mreducing[0m [93mwaste[0m [93mgeneration[0m and [93moperational[0m [93mcosts[0m. The [93mresults[0m of this [93mstudy[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93mpotential[0m of [93mborated[0m [93mmesoporous[0m [93mzirconia[0m as a [93msustainable[0m, [93mcost[0m-[93meffective[0m, and [93menvironmentally[0m [93mbenign[0m [93mcatalyst[0m for [93morganic[0m [93msynthesis[0m, [93moffering[0m [93msignificant[0m [93madvantages[0m in [93mpharmaceutical[0m and [93mfine[0m [93mchemical[0m [93mindustries[0m.

In [93maddition[0m, the [93mpractical[0m [93mapplication[0m of [93mNT[0m-[93mconfined[0m [93mcatalysts[0m was [93msummarized[0m, [93mfocusing[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mstability[0m, [93mregeneration[0m, and [93mcurrent[0m [93mchallenges[0m in [93mreal[0m-[93mwater[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mEventually[0m, the [93mfuture[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mdirections[0m for [93mdeveloping[0m [93menhanced[0m [93mfunctional[0m, [93mstable[0m, and [93menvironmentally[0m [93mcompatible[0m [93mNT[0m-[93mconfined[0m [93mcatalysts[0m were [93mproposed[0m. This [93mreview[0m is [93manticipated[0m to [93mbridge[0m [93mfundamental[0m [93mknowledge[0m and [93mperformance[0m-[93moriented[0m [92mdesign[0m of [93mNT[0m-[93mconfined[0m [93mcatalysts[0m, [93madvancing[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mimplementation[0m.
- A [93mPotential[0m [91mPathway[0m for the [93mSynthesis[0m of [93mBiomass[0m-[93mBased[0m [93mPolyamide[0m [93mMonomer[0m [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mBis[0m([93maminomethyl[0m)[93mfuran[0m from [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mFurandicarboxylic[0m [93mAcid[0m.: In this [93mstudy[0m, the [93mtransformation[0m of [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mfurandicarboxylic[0m [93macid[0m ([93mFDCA[0m) to [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mbis[0m([93maminomethyl[0m)[93mfuran[0m ([93mBAMF[0m) is [93mproposed[0m and [95minvestigated[0m for the [93mfirst[0m [93mtime[0m. [93mUsing[0m [93mFDCA[0m as the [93msubstrate[0m, the [93mprocess[0m [93minvolves[0m [93mtwo[0m [93mkey[0m [93msteps[0m: [93mfirst[0m, [93mconverting[0m [93mFDCA[0m to [93m2[0m,[93m5[0m-[93mdicyanofuran[0m ([93mDCF[0m) [93mvia[0m [93mcarboxy[0m-[93mcyanation[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by the [93mheterogeneous[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mhydrogenation[0m of [93mDCF[0m to [93mproduce[0m [93mBAMF[0m. For the [93mcarboxy[0m-[93mcyanation[0m, [93mtwo[0m [93mammoniation[0m [91mroutes[0m were [93mcompared[0m, [93mincluding[0m the [93mmolten[0m [93mammoniated[0m [93mdehydration[0m [91mroute[0m and the [93mmoderate[0m [93mammoniated[0m [93mdehydration[0m [91mroute[0m. For the [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mreaction[0m of [93mDCF[0m, [93mRaney[0m [93mCo[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mperformance[0m, [93machieving[0m a [93m94[0m.[93m5[0m% [93myield[0m of [93mBAMF[0m from [93mDCF[0m. [93mBased[0m on [93mindustrial[0m [93mpractice[0m, this [93mresearch[0m [93mrepresents[0m the [93mfirst[0m [93mexploration[0m of the [91mpathway[0m from [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mFDCA[0m to [93mBAMF[0m, which [93mopens[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mline[0m for the [93msustainable[0m [93mproduction[0m of [93mbio[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mdiamines[0m.
